title: Emmerdale spoilers: Dramatic trailer reveals shock explosion, birth drama and exit
text:
Emmerdale have dropped a new trailer for a huge upcoming week that will change everything — and it’s safe to say there’s a lot going on in the 30 second clip, as Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley) discovers that wife Moira (Natalie J Robb) has been having an affair with farmhand Nate Robinson (Jurrell Carter), and Chas Dingle (Lucy Pargeter) goes into labour with Marlon (Mark Charnock) by her side.

Yes, it’s set to be a truly explosive week in the Dales, as the truth about Moira’s affair with Nate comes to light — with Faith (Sally Dexter) seemingly being the one to enlighten a confused Cain. How Faith discovers what’s been going on has yet to be revealed, but the bigger question is: what does Cain have in store for both Nate and Moira?

He’s certainly going to be out for revenge and, in the snippet, both Cain and Nate get into a brutal brawl on a boat, before said boat is pictured going up in flames. Could one of them lose their life as a result?

Elsewhere, Chas gets trapped in the loos, and matters go from bad to worse when she goes into labour. Will Paddy (Dominic Brunt) be able to get there in time before she gives birth?

Then there’s Robert (Ryan Hawley) and Aaron’s (Dany Miller) attempt to evade the law. Upon learning that Lee has died, Robert is unable to process the news‚ and knowing that this new development could mean he’ll be charged with murder, Liv (Isobel Steele) suggests that Robert not only goes on the run, but that he takes Aaron with him.

Footage in the trailer sees police vehicles arriving, as a worried Aaron and Robert hide. Will the pair manage to get out of dodge before the law catches up with them?
